item.title: Introduction

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a penetration tester and security researcher. I do CTF challenges in my free time. Profiles Twitter Github HackTheBox Certifications OSCP GWAPT CEHv9 CISA Recent Training Offensive Security - Pentesting With Kali (PWK) v2 SANS SEC642 - Advanced Web App Penetration Testing SANS SEC442 - Web App Penetration Testing EC-Council - Malware & Memory Forensics EC-Council - Mobile Forensics
